General.Name: Jiangxi Special Electric Motor Co Ltd
General.Description: Jiangxi Special Electric Motor Co.,Ltd researches, develops, produces, and sells motor and lithium products in China. The company offers construction machinery, hoisting metallurgical, wind power supporting, servo, military, and energy vehicle motors. Its products are used in construction tower cranes, lifting metallurgical machinery, wind power equipment, elevators and escalators, textile machines, embroidery machines, packaging machines, printing machines, CNC machine tools, robots, ships, armored vehicles, heavy trucks, sanitation vehicles, and other fields. Jiangxi Special Electric Motor Co.,Ltd is based in Yichun, China.
General.Address: No. 581, South Huancheng Road, Yichun, China, 336000
